oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Harvey. Thomas Smith Harvey.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Daguerreotype (or tintype) believed to be Thomas Smith Harvey (born October 11, 1839). He enlisted in the Union Army on February 6, 1862 at Flat Lick, KY and mustered out on February 23, 1865 in Nashville, TN. On October 16, 1865 he married Martha W. Cofer. Pictured in military uniform.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Military personnel; Military uniforms; Daguerreotypes;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
